time_window.name: Time Window
time_window.description: The Demand Flexibility Service (DFS) session period for Octopus Energy, indicating when the service is scheduled to be active

utilization.name: Utilization
utilization.description: Current DFS session bid status - Accepted means the session is active, Rejected means it was not selected

highest_accepted.name: Highest Accepted Bid
highest_accepted.description: The highest accepted bid price from any participant in today's DFS session
